title: DORA | DevOps Research and Assessment
excerpt: DORA is a long running research program that seeks to understand the capabilities that drive software delivery and operations performance. DORA helps teams apply those capabilities, leading to better organizational performance.

title: Learnings from 5 years of tech startup code audits - Ken Kantzer's Blog
excerpt: While I was leading PKC’s security practice, we did probably 20-30 code security audits, almost of all of them for startups that were just around their Series A or B (that was usually when they had cash and realized that it’d be good to take a deeper look at their security, after the do-or-die focus on product market fit).

title: Ship / Show / Ask: A modern branching strategy
excerpt: Ship/Show/Ask is a branching strategy that helps teams wait less and ship more, without losing out on feedback.
